testcase.classname: Ensure search functionality is working correctly
testcase.name: Verify search is displayed on different pages
testcase.system-out: Given Application is launched...............................................passed When I navigate to Contact Us page..........................................passed Then Search is displayed on every page screen...............................passed When I navigate to MyAccount Register.......................................passed When I navigate to MyAccount Login..........................................passed When I navigate to Wish List page...........................................passed When I navigate to Shopping Cart page.......................................passed When I navigate to Checkout page............................................passed When I navigate to Tablets category by clicking on first level menu.........passed When I navigate to Desktops Mac sub-category by clicking on second level menu.passed

testcase.classname: Ensure search functionality is working correctly
testcase.name: Verify search with text input
testcase.system-out: Given Application is launched...............................................passed When I input the text "mac" in the search field.............................passed And I select search button..................................................passed Then I verify that result include items related to "mac"....................passed

testcase.classname: Ensure search functionality is working correctly
testcase.name: Verify search with numbers input
testcase.system-out: Given Application is launched...............................................passed When I input numbers "300" in the search field..............................passed And I select search button..................................................passed Then I verify that result include items related to numbers "300"............passed

testcase.classname: Ensure search functionality is working correctly
testcase.name: Verify search field has blue line
testcase.system-out: Given Application is launched...............................................passed When I input the text "a" in the search field with grey borders.............passed Then I verify that the borders of the field has bleu borders................passed

testcase.classname: Ensure search functionality is working correctly
testcase.name: Verify search in product descriptions has result
testcase.system-out: Given Application is launched...............................................passed When I select search icon when search field is empty........................passed And I select a checkbox: Search in product descriptions.....................passed And I input the text "phone" in the search criteria field...................passed And I select blue search button.............................................passed Then I verify that result include items related to "phone"..................passed

testcase.name: Verify that list of products after search have pagination
